nodes.text: Get away!

Ah, Rose. The proprietor of Rose's Bed and Breakfast. Now, you didn’t hear it from me, but have you ever wondered why her ‘coop’ is so well protected? She says it’s to protect her chickens from predators, but if you look closely it looks as if she’s trying to keep something in rather than out. Plus, whoever heard of chickens laying twelve pound  eggs?

Yup! That’s what I thought. It’s funny how Neanderthal and civilized speech crosses roads on this subject. [You don’t even see it coming. But you’re sure the red hand print on your face will  disappear some day.]
We need to talk about the distance between us.
[She blushes] Stop, you’re embarrassing me. You are just the sweetest thing. Why don’t come  over here and sit by me.
He’s family; I don’t spread rumors about my own family.
Why, hello there, stranger. I’m Miria.
That’s just sick!
Have you come to the right place! This town is so boring, there’s nothing else to do but gossip and… [She keeps talking for awhile and sometime later you’re able to get a word in.]
It’s really strange, but I hear some ranchers say that every once in a while a brahmin will give birth to a calf with only one head. Talk about weird!
Bitch!
How dare you call me a slut! Let me tell you, I am very picky about the people I sleep with. Why, I have only slept with 10 or 20 people this month! I think this conversation is over!
No. I don’t think so. I’m tired of this conversation. Good bye.
Great, I guess this means I have to run this dump now.
You know, I’m just a normal guy like everyone else. Why, my friends say, " you’re just so cool because you’re normal just like everyone else." Yep, normal that’s me.
Want what? Just what are you implying?
That better not mean what I think that means.
Rumor has it that Farrel stole the watch.
Because poor people tend to steal to make ends meet. Farrel definitely falls in the poor category, and that would explain the new tools he bought soon after Cornelius’s watch disappeared.
If I weren’t so bored, I’d say no. So ask away.
Who, me? I do odd jobs here and there. Surely nothing worth talking about. [She flutters her  eyes at you.]
Yes, they were thick as thieves, those two. Which is why I think Farrel stole the watch. Who else but Farrel would have the access and the opportunity to steal Cornelius’s watch?

Nothing to tell. My family runs the slaughterhouse. People from all around bring their brahmin here for slaughter. After they are slaughtered and the meat treated, it is sold to traders who in turn sell it to merchants in various towns. All very boring, if you ask me.
How disappointing. You are just like everyone else, aren’t you?
I can’t take this anymore! You’re perfect. [She rips off her clothes, your clothes, and then…]

links.text: Tell me more rumors.
Let’s talk about something else.
I think this going too far. Can’t we just talk?
I thought you’d never ask. Why don’t we get a little more comfortable.
All right! You know what I want, baby!
You are a slut, aren’t you!
Tell me more rumors.
Let’s talk about something else.
Hubba! Hubba!
What can you tell me about the slaughterhouse?
Heard any good rumors?
What do you do around here?
What’s this about a mutated brahmin?
What do you know about the Cornelius’s missing watch?
Let’s talk about something else.
Tell me about Davin.
You mentioned something about Rose?
Let’s talk about something else.
Tell me more rumors.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
You slut! I thought you were special for a moment.
Well, I’ve never known anyone as interesting as you are.
I think you know what I’m talking about, baby. You know this is what you want. [You smile and  start to undress.]
Forget it; I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to imply anything.
Urg?
Aoooga!
Tell me some more rumors.
Why would Farrel steal the watch?
Isn’t Farrel Cornelius’s best friend?
Tell me more rumors.
Isn’t Farrel Cornelius’s best friend?
Can I ask you a few more questions?
Heard any good rumors?
What do you do around here?
What can you tell me about the slaughterhouse?
I really would like to know more about you.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
You're right, enough talk. Let's get it on! You know you want it.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
Why would Farrel steal the watch?
Tell me more rumors.
Can I ask you a few more questions?
Can I ask you a few more questions?
[Your world will never be the same again.]
